# Ordinary Markdown

## Text and Lists

This is an ordinary **paragraph**. Including urls is also quite easy with `[]()` (i.e. search for something on [google](https://google.com)). Unordered lists looks like this:

- Element 1
- Element 2


# Use R Code

## R Chunks

`R` Chunks can be included with standard `Rmd` syntax:

```{r}
head(iris)
```

## Graphics

```{r, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,echo=FALSE,fig.align='center'}
library(ggplot2) 

ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) + geom_point() + theme_bw()
```
